programme.title: UEFA Super Cup Preview 2025
programme.desc: Paris Saint-Germain and Tottenham Hotspur are both vying for their inaugural UEFA Super Cup title as they prepare to clash in the 2025 edition at the Stadio Friuli in Udine.Following their historic victory in the UEFA Champions League in May, Paris Saint-Germain is on a quest to become the first French club to secure the Super Cup. Meanwhile, Tottenham Hotspur, fresh off their UEFA Europa League triumph in the 2024/25 season, aims to become the seventh English team to lift this prestigious trophy.The winner of this match will mark a significant milestone as the 26th team to achieve Super Cup glory, and they will be the second new name to be etched into the trophy's history in just three ye

programme.title: Bayern München vs Internazionale - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Quarter Finals - 1st Leg
programme.desc: This will be the 10th meeting between Bayern Munich and Internazionale in European competition, with the German side winning five of the previous nine, including the last time they faced each other in the UEFA Champions League. Internazionale have lost four of their seven games against Bayern Munich in the UEFA Champions League, but have eliminated them in both of their meetings in the knockout stages of the competition: 2-0 in the 2009-10 final and progressing on away goals over two legs in 2010-11 in the last 16.

programme.title: Rangers vs Athletic Club - UEFA Europa League 2024/25 - Quarter Final's 1st Leg
programme.desc: Rangers and Athletic Club faced in the 1968-69 Inter-Cities Fairs Cup in the quarter-final – the Gers won 4-1 in the first leg at home, before Athletic won 2-0 in the second leg, with the Scottish side going through 4-3 on aggregate. Athletic Club have lost both of their major European visits to Scotland, losing 1-0 to Dunfermline Athletic in 1965 and 4-1 to Rangers in 1969, both in the Inter-Cities Fairs Cup.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Eintracht Frankfurt - UEFA Europa League 2024/25 - Quarter Final's 1st Leg
programme.desc: Tottenham Hotspur and Eintracht Frankfurt last faced in the UEFA Champions League group stages in 2022-23, with Spurs drawing 0-0 in Germany and winning 3-2 at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium that season. The only previous European knockout meeting between Spurs and Eintracht Frankfurt was in the 1981-82 Cup Winners’ Cup quarter-final – Spurs won 2-0 at home before losing 2-1 away in the second leg, but progressed 3-2 on aggregate.

programme.title: PSG vs Aston Villa - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Quarter Finals - 1st Leg
programme.desc: Paris SG and Aston Villa will meet for the first time in European competition, with this just the second UEFA Champions League quarter-final between French and English sides in the last eight campaigns. Paris SG eliminated Liverpool in the last 16 of this season’s UEFA Champions League, after having exited the competition in each of their last three knockout stage meetings with English sides.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Borussia Dortmund - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Quarter Finals - 1st Leg
programme.desc: Barcelona are unbeaten in their five meetings with Borussia Dortmund in European competition, including a victory over them earlier in this season’s UEFA Champions League. Only against Lyon, Napoli and Werder Bremen have they played more in Europe without losing. While Borussia Dortmund haven’t won any of their five games against Barcelona, they’ve only gone six consecutive European matches without beating an opponent against two other sides; one of which is another Spanish team.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Olympique Lyonnais - UEFA Europa League 2024/25 - Quater Final's 2nd Leg
programme.desc: This will be the third time that Manchester United have faced Lyon in European competition at Old Trafford, with the Red Devils winning both prior meetings. Lyon have lost just one of their last nine European games against sides from England, a 3-0 defeat to West Ham during the 2021-22 UEFA Europa League.

programme.title: Athletic Club vs Rangers - UEFA Europa League 2024/25 - Quater Final's 2nd Leg
programme.desc: Athletic Club have only hosted Rangers once before, beating them 2-0 in the Fairs Cup in April 1969. The only other time Athletic have hosted a Scottish club was in two games against Dunfermline in 1965, also in the Fairs Cup, winning 1-0 and then 2-1 in a deciding game. Rangers won 3-2 away at Real Betis in their last European game in Spain, having gone 13 away games without winning there beforehand between 1962 and 2018.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - FA Community Shield 2025
programme.desc: Live and exclusive only on beIN, the traditional curtain raiser to the English Premier League season, the FA Community Shield. The match will be between Liverpool FC and Crystal Palace FC, the winners of the previous season's Premier League and FA Cup. It will be played at Wembley Stadium, London.

programme.title: Secret of Success : Adam Ounass, A Symbol of Skill
programme.desc: At the beginning the signs of his distinction emerged , his talent and uniqueness set him apart , from childhood , he wrote the first letters of his success story. He practices , played and followed the path of learning striving hard and listening attentively to his coaches .When it s comes to discussing the best , ADAM OUNASS Is no different from other football enthusiasts , he has his preferences and tastes , yet he always refers to statistics relying on facts and career trajectories before forming an opinion. Adam Ounass in the secret of success spots on his very special career from the land of his birth to Qatar with Al Sadd team.

programme.title: EPL Stories 2025/2026 - BRUNO GUIMARÃES
programme.desc: Showcasing the personalities who have shaped the Premier League era, in each episode we tell their unique story that will be sure to engage and entertain all fans.

programme.title: England vs Spain - UEFA Women's EURO 2025 - Championship Switzerland - Final's
programme.desc: The UEFA Women's EURO 2025 – Championship is the 14th edition of the UEFA Women’s Championship, Switzerland is hosting the tournament from 2 till 27 July 2025 with 16 national teams competing to win the title.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - FA Community Shield 2025
programme.desc: Live and exclusive only on beIN, the traditional curtain raiser to the English Premier League season, the FA Community Shield. The match will be between Liverpool FC and Crystal Palace FC, the winners of the previous season's Premier League and FA Cup. It will be played at Wembley Stadium, London.

programme.title: Arsenal vs PSG - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Semi Finals - 1st Leg
programme.desc: This will be the sixth meeting between Arsenal and Paris SG, while the Gunners are unbeaten across the previous five. Arsenal are the opponent that the French side have faced the most times in European competition without ever winning. Arsenal have already beaten Paris SG in the UEFA Champions League this season, winning 2-0 at the Emirates Stadium in the league phase last October. Only one English side have beaten Paris SG twice in a single edition of the competition: Manchester City in the 2020-21 semi-finals.

programme.title: UEFA UCL Magazine2024/2025 - Season Review
programme.desc: A recap of the best of the action, plus a look forward to the next Match Day in Europe’s premium football competition, the UEFA Champions League. This season is the first in the new format, with 36 participating teams in a league phase replacing the previous Group stage. All matches from the UEFA Champions League are live and exclusive only on beIN.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - FA Community Shield 2025
programme.desc: Live and exclusive only on beIN, the traditional curtain raiser to the English Premier League season, the FA Community Shield. The match will be between Liverpool FC and Crystal Palace FC, the winners of the previous season's Premier League and FA Cup. It will be played at Wembley Stadium, London.

programme.title: Bodø / Glimt vs Tottenham Hotspur - UEFA Europa League 2024/25 - Sime Final's 2nd Leg
programme.desc: In the history of the UEFA Europa League since its rebrand ahead of the 2009-10 season, there have been 92 instances of a side winning the first leg of a knockout match on home soil by a 2+ goal margin, of which only nine have failed to progress in the overall tie. All eight prior semi-finalists to achieve the feat have progressed to the final. Across their major European history, Bodø/Glimt have lost all four of their matches against English opposition, including their only one on home soil vs Arsenal in October 2022. Each of the other three defeats have seen the Norwegian side concede exactly three goals.

programme.title: EPL Stories 2025/2026 - BRUNO GUIMARÃES
programme.desc: Showcasing the personalities who have shaped the Premier League era, in each episode we tell their unique story that will be sure to engage and entertain all fans.

programme.title: Internazionale vs Barcelona - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Semi Finals - 2nd Leg
programme.desc: This will be the 18th major European meeting between Internazionale and Barcelona, with only Bayern Munich vs Real Madrid, Juventus vs Real Madrid and Inter vs Real Madrid played more often in history. Each of the last two games between the teams have ended 3-3, in the UEFA Champions League in October 2022 and this season’s first leg. Barcelona have won just one of their six away UEFA Champions League matches against Internazionale, a 2-1 win in December 2019. Overall, Barca have managed just five wins in 24 away games in Italy, their lowest win ratio in any non-Spanish nation in the competition.

programme.title: PSG vs Arsenal - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Semi Finals - 2nd Leg
programme.desc: PSG’s 1-0 win the first leg was their first ever victory in six attempts against Arsenal. Both of their home games against the Gunners have finished 1-1. Having been unbeaten in their first 13 away games against French sides in all competitions, Arsenal have now lost their last two visits against Rennes in 2019 and Lens in 2023.

programme.title: Athletic Club vs Manchester United - UEFA Europa League 2024/25 - Semi Final's 1st Leg
programme.desc: This is the first European meeting between Athletic Club and Manchester United since the 2011-12 UEFA Europa League last 16 – under Marcelo Bielsa, Athletic won both legs and eventually reached that season’s final. Manchester United have lost three out of four European matches against Athletic Club, with their one win coming back in February 1957 in the second leg of that season’s European Cup quarter-final, a 3-0 victory at Old Trafford which took them into the semi-final 6-5 on aggregate.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - FA Community Shield 2025
programme.desc: Live and exclusive only on beIN, the traditional curtain raiser to the English Premier League season, the FA Community Shield. The match will be between Liverpool FC and Crystal Palace FC, the winners of the previous season's Premier League and FA Cup. It will be played at Wembley Stadium, London.

programme.title: EPL Season Preview - 2025/2026
programme.desc: All 380 matches from the English Premier league are live and exclusive only on beIN.All matches are available live with a choice of Arabic or English commentary.The season will consist of 33 weekends and five midweek rounds of matches.Liverpool are the defending champions, having won their second Premier League title.

programme.title: Arsenal vs PSG - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Semi Finals - 1st Leg
programme.desc: This will be the sixth meeting between Arsenal and Paris SG, while the Gunners are unbeaten across the previous five. Arsenal are the opponent that the French side have faced the most times in European competition without ever winning. Arsenal have already beaten Paris SG in the UEFA Champions League this season, winning 2-0 at the Emirates Stadium in the league phase last October. Only one English side have beaten Paris SG twice in a single edition of the competition: Manchester City in the 2020-21 semi-finals.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Internazionale - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Semi Finals - 1st Leg
programme.desc: Barcelona and Internazionale have faced each other on 16 previous occasions in Europe, with the Spanish side winning exactly half of those. They are winless in the most recent two, however, which came in the group stages of the 2022-23 UEFA Champions League. This will be just the second time Barcelona and Internazionale have met in the knockout stages of the European Cup/UEFA Champions League, with both coming precisely at the semi-final stage. The previous one – played in 2009-10 – saw José Mourinho’s Inter eliminate the reigning champions 3-2 on aggregate.

programme.title: PSG vs Internazionale - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Final
programme.desc: This is the first ever competitive meeting between Inter and Paris SG. It’s also the second European Cup/UEFA Champions League final between an Italian and a French side, after Marseille beat Milan 1-0 in 1993 – the only time a French side has ever won the trophy. That final was also held in Munich. This is Inter’s seventh appearance in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League final, winning the trophy three times. They did lose their last final match, going down 1-0 against Manchester City in 2023.

programme.desc: Live and exclusive only on beIN, the traditional curtain raiser to the English Premier League season, the FA Community Shield. programme.desc: The 2024-25 UEFA Europa League final will be the sixth all-English major European competition final, and the third of those to involve Tottenham Hotspur, after the 1971-72 UEFA Cup final and the 2018-19 UEFA Champions League final. This will be the fourth UEFA Europa League final to be contested between two sides from the same nation, after 2011, 2012, and 2019.

programme.title: Rayo Vallecano vs Getafe - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 34
programme.desc: Rayo Vallecano have only won two of their last nine LaLiga matches against Getafe, after having achieved eight wins in their previous 10 top-flight clashes beforehand. Getafe have drawn 0-0 against Rayo Vallecano in both of their last two LaLiga visits to Vallecas; only against Osasuna at El Sadar have they recorded three consecutive 0-0 draws away from home in their LaLiga history.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Celta de Vigo - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 34
programme.desc: Real Madrid have won 19 and drawn two of their last 21 LaLiga matches against Celta de Vigo, scoring in all 21, their longest ever unbeaten run against the Galician side and their longest current unbeaten run against any opponent in the competition. Celta de Vigo have picked up just one point from their last 12 away LaLiga matches against Real Madrid, a 2-2 draw in February 2020, and have not won at Real Madrid in the competition since November 2006 under Fernando Vázquez.

programme.title: Sevilla vs Leganés - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 34
programme.desc: Sevilla have only won two of their last six LaLiga games against Leganés and lost 0-1 in the reverse fixture this season. They have never lost both fixtures in a single campaign against Leganés in the top-flight. At home, Sevilla have only lost one of their eight home games in all competitions against Leganés, going 0-3 in LaLiga in May 2019.

programme.title: Las Palmas vs Valencia - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 34
programme.desc: UD Las Palmas have won six of their 12 LaLiga matches against Valencia in the 21st Century, more than against any other opponent in the competition in this period. Valencia have lost their last four away matches against UD Las Palmas in LaLiga. Only once before have the Valencian side lost more consecutive away matches against the Canary Islands in the competition.

programme.title: Real Valladolid vs Barcelona - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 34
programme.desc: Real Valladolid have won two of their last five home matches against FC Barcelona in LaLiga, achieving the same number of victories as in their previous 17 home matches in the competition. Barcelona have won 16 of their last 18 LaLiga matches against Real Valladolid, losing the other two, both at the José Zorrilla. This is the Blaugrana's longest run in the competition without a draw.

programme.title: Athletic Bilbao vs Deportivo Alavés - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 35
programme.desc: Athletic Club have not lost any of their last six LaLiga matches against Alavés, their second-longest unbeaten run against the Vitoria side in the competition, following their first 14 top-flight clashes. Deportivo Alavés have picked up points in four of their last eight away matches against Athletic Club in LaLiga, having lost each of their first 10 visits to the club in the competition.

programme.title: Leganés vs Espanyol - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 35
programme.desc: Leganés have not lost any of their last three LaLiga matches against Espanyol, their longest unbeaten run against the Perico team in the top-flight. Espanyol have not won any of their last three away matches against CD Leganés in all competitions, failing to score in all three. This is their worst all-time run without a win or a goal away from home against the Pepineros.

programme.title: Valencia vs Getafe - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 35
programme.desc: Valencia have won only four of their last 17 LaLiga matches against Getafe, after winning 12 of their previous 16 top-flight matches. Getafe have lost each of their last three LaLiga away matches against Valencia, after picking up points in their previous five visits to Mestalla in the competition.

programme.title: Celta de Vigo vs Sevilla - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 35
programme.desc: Celta de Vigo have picked up points in five of their last six LaLiga matches against Sevilla, after losing seven of their previous 11 in the competition. Sevilla have not lost any of their last four away matches against Celta de Vigo in LaLiga, their longest unbeaten run away from home against the Galician side in their top-flight history.

programme.title: Atlético Madrid vs Real Sociedad - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 35
programme.desc: Atlético de Madrid have not lost any of their last 10 LaLiga matches against Real Sociedad, since a 0-2 defeat in September 2019, their longest unbeaten run against the San Sebastian side in the competition since April 1976. At home, Atlético de Madrid have not lost in their last 11 LaLiga matches against Real Sociedad, since a 0-1 defeat in March 2013, scoring exactly two goals in six of the last seven.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Real Madrid - LaLiga 2024/25
programme.desc: Barcelona have won their last three matches against Real Madrid in all competitions, only once in the entire history of ElClásico, between 2008 and 2010 under Josep Guardiola, have the Blaugrana managed 4+ consecutive wins. Real Madrid have won four of their last five away matches against FC Barcelona in all competitions, achieving the same number of victories as in their previous 19 visits to Barcelona.

programme.title: Celta de Vigo vs Sevilla - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 35
programme.desc: Celta de Vigo have picked up points in five of their last six LaLiga matches against Sevilla, after losing seven of their previous 11 in the competition. Sevilla have not lost any of their last four away matches against Celta de Vigo in LaLiga, their longest unbeaten run away from home against the Galician side in their top-flight history.

programme.title: Atlético Madrid vs Real Sociedad - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 35
programme.desc: Atlético de Madrid have not lost any of their last 10 LaLiga matches against Real Sociedad, since a 0-2 defeat in September 2019, their longest unbeaten run against the San Sebastian side in the competition since April 1976. At home, Atlético de Madrid have not lost in their last 11 LaLiga matches against Real Sociedad, since a 0-1 defeat in March 2013, scoring exactly two goals in six of the last seven.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Real Madrid - LaLiga 2024/25
programme.desc: Barcelona have won their last three matches against Real Madrid in all competitions, only once in the entire history of ElClásico, between 2008 and 2010 under Josep Guardiola, have the Blaugrana managed 4+ consecutive wins. Real Madrid have won four of their last five away matches against FC Barcelona in all competitions, achieving the same number of victories as in their previous 19 visits to Barcelona.

programme.title: Sevilla vs Las Palmas - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 36
programme.desc: Sevilla have won seven and drawn just one of their last eight LaLiga matches against UD Las Palmas, their longest unbeaten run against the Canary Islands side in their history in the top-flight. UD Las Palmas have not won any of their last 11 away matches against Sevilla in LaLiga. Prior to this run, the Gran Canaria side had won seven of their last 14 away games against Sevilla in the competition.

programme.title: Real Valladolid vs Girona - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 36
programme.desc: Real Valladolid have won both of their home matches against Girona in LaLiga, both 1-0. Only against three teams have the Valladolid side won their first three home matches without conceding in the top-flight: Mallorca in 1983, Cádiz in 1986, and Alavés in 1998. After their victory in the reverse fixture in December 2024, Girona can win back-to-back matches against Real Valladolid in all competitions for the second time in history, having achieved this feat between 2015 and 2016 in LaLiga Hypermotion.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Mallorca - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 36
programme.desc: Real Madrid have won 12 of their last 13 home games against Mallorca in LaLiga, following a run of four winless home games against the Balearic team in the competition. After a 1-1 draw at Son Moix in August 2024, Mallorca can pick up points in both of their LaLiga games against Real Madrid in the same season for the fourth time in history, having previously achieved it in 1989/90, 2000/01, and 2001/02.

programme.title: Rayo Vallecano vs Real Betis - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 36
programme.desc: Rayo Vallecano have won four of their last eight home games against Real Betis in LaLiga, after only managing one victory in their first seven home matches against the Verdiblancos in the top-flight. Real Betis have not won either of their last two games against Rayo Vallecano in LaLiga. Prior to this run, Betis had won six of their last nine matches against the Madrilenian side in the competition.

programme.title: Villarreal vs Leganés - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 36
programme.desc: Villarreal have won six of their nine LaLiga matches against Leganés, including their most recent 5-2 win at Butarque in December 2024. They could achieve a league double against the Madrid side in the same campaign for the second time in the competition, having also achieved it in 2018/19. This will be the fifth meeting at La Cerámica between Villarreal and CD Leganés in LaLiga, with the Villarreal side achieving three wins and Leganés one, with all four by the same scoreline: 2-1.

programme.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - LaLiga 2024/25 Week 36
programme.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 27 LaLiga matches against FC Barcelona, the longest winless run for any team in a regional derby in the competition's history. Barcelona have not lost any of their last 15 away matches against Espanyol in LaLiga and, if they do not lose in the derby, they will equal the longest unbeaten run away from home against the same opponent in their history in the competition, achieved against Villarreal between 2008 and 2024.

programme.title: Rennes vs Nantes - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 30
programme.desc: Rennes have not conceded a goal in six of their last nine encounters against Nantes in Ligue 1, their highest tally of clean sheets against the same opponent in the competition since the start of 2021. Rennes have not lost any of their last 10 home matches against Nantes in Ligue 1, winning the last five.

programme.title: PSG vs Le Havre - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 30
programme.desc: Paris SG have not conceded a goal in 15 of their 31 encounters against Le Havre in Ligue 1, or 48.4% of matches. This is their second best clean sheet ratio against the same opponent among they’ve teams faced at least 30 times in the top-flight after Brest. Paris SG have lost only one of their 15 home matches against Le Havre in Ligue 1, 0-2 on 24 January 1998 with a brace from Cyrille Pouget.

programme.title: Olympique Marseille vs Montpellier - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 30
programme.desc: Marseille have not lost any of their last 11 matches against Montpellier in Ligue 1, scoring at least one goal in each of those games. Marseille have lost only two of their 29 home matches against Montpellier in Ligue 1, in April 2012 and in August 2014.

programme.title: Saint-Étienne vs Olympique Lyonnais - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 30
programme.desc: This will be the 125th derby between St Etienne and Lyon in all competitions. Les Gones have kept 41 clean sheets in those games, more than against any other team in their history. Lyon have won 11 of their 18 trips to St Etienne in Ligue 1 in the 21st century, being the team that has beaten Les Verts the most in Geoffroy-Guichard over the period.

programme.title: Brest vs Lens - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 30
programme.desc: Brest have lost each of their last two games against Lens in Ligue 1 and could suffer three consecutive defeats for the first time in their history against this opponent in the top-flight. Brest have a 69% home win rate against Lens in Ligue 1, their highest percentage against a club they have played at home at least 10 times. RCL could become the first team that Brest manage to beat 10 times at home in Ligue 1.

programme.title: Angers SCO vs Lille - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 31
programme.desc: Angers have lost six of their last 10 matches against Lille in Ligue 1, one more than in the first 33. Angers have lost six of their last seven Ligue 1 matches, as many as in the previous 17. Since the start of March, only Montpellier has scored fewer goals than Sco in the top-flight.

programme.title: Olympique Lyonnais vs Rennes - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 31
programme.desc: Lyon have lost six of their last nine home games against Rennes in Ligue 1, not losing more often to any other team at home in the last 10 years. Rennes have scored at least three goals in five of their last seven meetings against Lyon, including the two most recent ones. The Bretons could score at least three times in three consecutive matches against the same opponent in the top-flight in the 21st century for the third time, after having already done so against Metz and... Lyon.

programme.title: Olympique Marseille vs Brest - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 31
programme.desc: Marseille have scored in each of their 15 home games against Brest in Ligue 1, only hosting Sète while finding the net each time in the top-flight. Marseille have scored at least five goals in five different games in Ligue 1 this season, no team have done it more often in the Top 5 European leagues in 2024-25. OM only scored 5+ goals in more L1 games in a single campaign in 1948-49 and 1970-71.

programme.title: Nantes vs Toulouse - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 31
programme.desc: Toulouse have scored 1 goal per game against Nantes in Ligue 1, recording a lower average only against Marseille and Paris SG among opponents faced at least 50 times in the top-flight. Nantes have only taken one point fewer against teams ranked in the first half of the table than against clubs placed from 10th place downwards, only Montpellier and Paris SG have a better differential.

programme.title: Lens vs Auxerre - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 31
programme.desc: Lens have lost none of their last nine Ligue 1 matches against Auxerre, being on a longer run only against Rennes among current top-flight teams. Lens have kept nine clean sheets at home against Auxerre in all competitions over the last 20 years, their joint-most against an opponent over that period.

programme.title: PSG vs Nice - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 31
programme.desc: Paris SG have scored in 22 of their last 24 Ligue 1 matches against Nice, with the exceptions being in the 2021-22 season. They’ve only found the net more often against Lyon and Lille than against the Gym under QSI. Nice have won two of their last three away games to the Ligue 1 title holders, as many as in the previous 29.

programme.title: Strasbourg vs Saint-Étienne - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 31
programme.desc: Strasbourg have won each of their last three Ligue 1 games against St Etienne, last winning four consecutive home matches against the same opponent in the top-flight in 2005. Strasbourg haven’t lost any of their last 10 Ligue 1 games and could equal their longest unbeaten run in the 21st century in the top-flight. RCSA have conceded just 10 goals in the top-flight this year, at least four fewer than any other team.

programme.title: Ligue 1 Highlights 2024/25 Week 31
programme.desc: Each Ligue 1 Match week is condensed into a 52-minute highlights show. Every game, goal, penalty, red card and everything in between is squeezed into an action-packed hour to ensure no football fan misses a kick across the game season.

programme.title: Olympique Lyonnais vs Rennes - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 31
programme.desc: Lyon have lost six of their last nine home games against Rennes in Ligue 1, not losing more often to any other team at home in the last 10 years. Rennes have scored at least three goals in five of their last seven meetings against Lyon, including the two most recent ones. The Bretons could score at least three times in three consecutive matches against the same opponent in the top-flight in the 21st century for the third time, after having already done so against Metz and... Lyon.

programme.title: Olympique Marseille vs Brest - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 31
programme.desc: Marseille have scored in each of their 15 home games against Brest in Ligue 1, only hosting Sète while finding the net each time in the top-flight. Marseille have scored at least five goals in five different games in Ligue 1 this season, no team have done it more often in the Top 5 European leagues in 2024-25. OM only scored 5+ goals in more L1 games in a single campaign in 1948-49 and 1970-71.

programme.title: Nantes vs Toulouse - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 31
programme.desc: Toulouse have scored 1 goal per game against Nantes in Ligue 1, recording a lower average only against Marseille and Paris SG among opponents faced at least 50 times in the top-flight. Nantes have only taken one point fewer against teams ranked in the first half of the table than against clubs placed from 10th place downwards, only Montpellier and Paris SG have a better differential.

programme.title: Lens vs Auxerre - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 31
programme.desc: Lens have lost none of their last nine Ligue 1 matches against Auxerre, being on a longer run only against Rennes among current top-flight teams. Lens have kept nine clean sheets at home against Auxerre in all competitions over the last 20 years, their joint-most against an opponent over that period.

programme.title: Nantes vs Angers SCO - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 32
programme.desc: Among the clubs against which Nantes have played at least five times in the last five seasons, Angers is, along with St Etienne, one of only two against which FCN have not lost. programme.title: Toulouse vs Rennes - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 32

programme.title: Strasbourg vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 32
programme.desc: Strasbourg have won only two of their last 34 matches against Paris SG in Ligue 1 : 3-1 in February 2005 and 2-1 in December 2017, both times at La Meinau. Strasbourg are unbeaten in their last 11 Ligue 1 matches, the longest current streak – RCSA have not had a longest unbeaten run in the top-flight since May-September 1993.

programme.title: Saint-Étienne vs Monaco - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 32

programme.title: Brest vs Lille - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 33
programme.desc: Brest have won just 19% of their games against Lille in Ligue 1, only having a lower win percentage against Paris SG amongst teams they’ve faced 10+ times in the division. programme.title: Le Havre vs Olympique Marseille - French Ligue 1 2024/25 Week 33

programme.title: Race 1 - Nürburgring Round - Porsche Cup Germany
Race 1 - Nürburgring Round - DTM - 2025
Main Race Qualifying - FIA Formula 1 World Championship - Hungarian GP - 2025
programme.desc: High stakes and razor-thin margins define this F1 qualifying session. Drivers must deliver perfect laps under pressure, navigating the narrow Hungaroring layout where overtaking is rare. Pole position is vital, and one mistake can mean starting far back on the grid.

programme.title: Main Race - FIA Formula 1 World Championship - Hungarian GP - 2025
programme.desc: The Grand Prix unfolds over 70 demanding laps, where strategy, precision, and discipline rule. Track position plays a major role, so undercuts and tyre tactics become decisive. With little margin for error, the Hungarian GP often rewards intelligent racecraft over sheer speed.

programme.title: GP Confidential 2025 Magazine
programme.desc: Explore the sporting secrets of F1. Across 25 episodes and in crisp 3D animations, we analyses the technical details, which decide which teams make the most of the rules - and which need to go back to the drawing board. Complemented by features on historical milestones as well as race previews - GP Confidential is the perfect treat for any F1 fan.

programme.title: Race 2 - Nürburgring Round - DTM - 2025
Sprint Race - FIA Formula 2 Championship -Budapest Round -2025
programme.desc: With a reversed top-10 grid and fewer laps, the Sprint Race features quick bursts of action and opportunistic overtaking. There are no scheduled pit stops, so tyre conservation and launch technique at the start are crucial to making up positions.

programme.title: Feature Race - FIA Formula 2 Championship -Budapest Round -2025
programme.desc: The crown jewel of the F2 weekend, the Feature Race includes mandatory pit stops and a full strategy game. Drivers need strong tyre management and composure to make overtakes count. With more points on offer, this race is essential in the title fight.

programme.title: SuperTri Toronto - Super Tri - 2025
programme.desc: A rapid-fire triathlon competition featuring elite international athletes in a condensed format of swim, bike, and run. Set in downtown Toronto, this event emphasizes speed, agility, and split-second transitions. It’s a tactical and explosive battle where endurance meets sprint racing.

programme.title: Sprint Race - FIA Formula 2 Championship -Budapest Round -2025
programme.desc: With a reversed top-10 grid and fewer laps, the Sprint Race features quick bursts of action and opportunistic overtaking. There are no scheduled pit stops, so tyre conservation and launch technique at the start are crucial to making up positions.

programme.title: Main Race Qualifying - FIA Formula 1 World Championship - Hungarian GP - 2025
programme.desc: High stakes and razor-thin margins define this F1 qualifying session. Drivers must deliver perfect laps under pressure, navigating the narrow Hungaroring layout where overtaking is rare. Pole position is vital, and one mistake can mean starting far back on the grid.

programme.title: Main Race - FIA Formula 1 World Championship - Hungarian GP - 2025
programme.desc: The Grand Prix unfolds over 70 demanding laps, where strategy, precision, and discipline rule. Track position plays a major role, so undercuts and tyre tactics become decisive. With little margin for error, the Hungarian GP often rewards intelligent racecraft over sheer speed.

programme.title: My Faith in Sport
programme.desc: Exploring the importance of prayer within Islam, the episode begins with an overview of our seven athletes as they introduce themselves and why Islam is so important to them. We are also introduced to Omar Sulieman, a notable Imam, who acts as narration throughout the series and a guiding voice on the key principles of Islam.The life and career of Sofyan Amrabat is explored, showcasing his role as a key part of the Fenerbahce team in Turkey and the Moroccan national side. The Atlas Lions’ run to the semi-finals of the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 is explored, with the impact that Salah played in the team’s belief and positivity throughout the tournament.

programme.title: Gold Standard Ep2
My Faith in Sport
programme.desc: Ramadan is a crucial period in the Islamic calendar but fasting (Sawm) can provide complications for athletes who are trying to compete at the highest level. But to what extent is fasting a negative or can it actually aid performance? We look at the life and adaptation throughout Ramadan of Adam Azim – an unbeaten professional boxer from the UK, Fares El Bakh – a weightlifter who won Qatar’s first ever Olympic gold medal, and Zainab Alema – a rugby player who is aiming to become the first player to represent England wearing a hijab.Experts in Sports Science and Nutrition from Aspetar Clinic, Qatar also add detail of the physical impact athletes encounter during Ramadan

programme.desc: Live from Mason, Ohio, the ATP Masters 1000 Cincinnati features a 96-player singles draw and a two-week format. Played on outdoor hard courts, this key US Open Series event offers 1000 ranking points to the champion and a total prize pool exceeding $9 million. Held at the expanded Lindner Family Tennis Center, it is one of the season’s most prestigious hard-court tournaments.

programme.title: Gran Turismo World Series 2025 - London
programme.desc: The Gran Turismo World Series, the competition to determine the world’s best Gran Turismo player, consists of Online Qualifiers open to all players and World Series Live Events, where Star Players gather in locations around the world to compete. The 2025 World Series will kick off in London, UK in June. It will then move on to Berlin, Germany in September and Los Angeles, USA in November. The series will conclude in December with the World Finals in Fukuoka, Japan.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs. Chelsea- English Premier League 2024/2025
programme.desc: Aston Villa have won just two of their last 11 Premier League home games against Chelsea, beating them 1-0 in March 2014 and 2-1 in May 2021. Chelsea have won 13 Premier League away games against Aston Villa, only winning more at Tottenham and Southampton in the competition’s history.

programme.title: Arsenal vs. Tottenham Hotspur- English Premier League 2024/2025
programme.desc: Arsenal have won six of their last eight Premier League games against Spurs and are looking to win three consecutive league games against them for the first time since January 1989. Tottenham have won just one of their last 31 Premier League away games against Arsenal and are winless in 13 since a 3-2 victory in November 2010.

programme.title: Main Race - FIA Formula 1 World Championship - Hungarian GP - 2025
programme.desc: beIN SPORTS is the live and exclusive broadcast partners of Formula 1 until end of 2033 season. The 2025 season has a record schedule of 24 Formula 1 races and all race weekends, including every Practice, Qualifying, Sprint & Race will be live & exclusive on beIN.

programme.title: Everton vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2024/2025
programme.desc: Everton won 2-0 in their last Premier League game against Liverpool in April 2024, last winning consecutive league Merseyside derbies in the 1984-85 campaign. Liverpool’s 2-0 loss in this exact fixture last season ended a 12-game unbeaten away run in the Premier League against Everton. They’ve not lost consecutive visits to Goodison Park since a run of three between 1992 and 1994.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Crystal Palace- English Premier League 2024/2025
programme.desc: Man City have lost just one of their last 12 Premier League games against Crystal Palace, going down 2-0 at home in October 2021. Having lost each of their first six Premier League visits to the Etihad Stadium, Crystal Palace have lost just two of their last six away to Man City in the competition.

programme.title: PIT vs MIL - MLB - 2025
programme.desc: Major League Baseball (MLB) is live and exclusive only on beIN. MLB comprises of 30 teams, divided equally between the National League (NL) and the American League (AL), with 29 teams in the United States and 1 in Canada. Los Angeles Dodgers are the current champions.
